comments:
The device server console showed the following db error messages when using DB2 as repository running Aperi-20070124-190706.zip build

delete from t_view_vhost2port where host_id = ?
 insert into t_view_vhost2port    SELECT HOST.PREFIX_ID PREFIX_ID, HOST.COMPUTER
_ID HOST_ID, PORT.PORT_ID   PORT_ID FROM T_VIEW_VHOST HOST, T_RES_HBA HBA, T_RES
_PORT PORT WHERE   HOST.PREFIX_ID = 'server:' and HOST.COMPUTER_ID = HBA.HOST_ID
 and   HBA.HBA_ID = PORT.HBA_ID AND HOST.computer_id = ?

ER_ID HOST_ID, PORT.PORT_ID PORT_ID FROM T_VIEW_VHOST HOST,   T_RES_CONTROLLER C
ONTROLLER, T_RES_PORT PORT WHERE HOST.PREFIX_ID =   'server:' and HOST.COMPUTER_
ID = CONTROLLER.COMPUTER_ID and   CONTROLLER.WWN_STR = PORT.NAME AND HOST.comput
er_id = ?

ER_ID HOST_ID, UNKNOWN2PORT.PORT_ID PORT_ID FROM T_VIEW_VHOST   HOST, T_VIEW_VUN
KNOWN2PORT UNKNOWN2PORT WHERE HOST.PREFIX_ID =   UNKNOWN2PORT.PREFIX_ID and HOST
.COMPUTER_ID = UNKNOWN2PORT.UNKNOWN_ID AND HOST.computer_id = ?

*** Bug 177038 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
